name: Mixed Vegetable Pulao
steps: Clean and wash rice thoroughly and keep aside.
Heat ghee in a pressure cooker.
Add bay leaves, cinnamon, cardamoms and cloves and stirfry till the spices crackle.
Add carrots, beans and peas and fry for 2-3 minutes.
Add the rice and stirfry for 2 minutes.
Close lid and place the pressure cooker on maximum heat.
When full cooking pressure is reached, reduce flame to medium heat and cook for 3 minutes.
Allow pressure cooker to cool for 3 minutes and open after releasing steam pressure.
Your Mixed Vegetable Pulao is ready to be served.
